resources.string: Your answer is incorrect or incomplete
In which of the following regions is Australia?
"Australia is in Asia-Pacific, Oceania and Australasia."\n\n"Answers 1, 2 and 4 are correct."
The 1st, 2nd and 3rd flags are New Zelander, Fijian and Tuvaluan.
What is the capital of Australia?
Canberra is the capital of Australia.
1. A brand of cheese made in Australia.
3. Is definitely a favourite in Australia.

"Answer 2 and 3 are correct."\n\n"Tim Tam is a brand of chocolate biscuit made by Arnott's. It consists of two malted biscuits separated by a light chocolate cream filling and coated in a thin layer of textured chocolate."
"Tim Tam biscuits are definitely a favovourite in Australia, with one in every two households containing a packet of these biscuits."
"Advance Australia Fair is Australia's national anthem."\n

"God Save the Queen is the British national anthem."\n"Power and the Passion is one of Midnight Oil's most famous songs."\n"Great Southern Land is a single released by the Australian rock band Icehouse in 1982."
"Robert Menzies was the Prime Minister of Australia from 1939 to 1941 and again from 1949 to 1966. He is Australia's longest-serving prime minister, serving over 18 years in total."
